title.rendered: “IDF Duvdevan Unit Neutralizes Terrorists in Jenin: Major Counter-Terrorism Operation Unveils Weapons Cache”

content.rendered:
IDF Spokesperson:

Fighters from the Duvdevan Unit eliminated four armed terrorists during an exchange of fire and struck others in the Jenin area of Menashe; the forces located weapons used by the terrorists.

IDF forces, under the intelligence direction of the Shin Bet, completed a counter-terrorism operation in the village of Dan in Jenin in the Menashe Brigade in recent hours.

As part of the operation, fighters from the Duvdevan Unit conducted a pressure operation on a structure used by terrorists in the area, and during the exchange of fire with the terrorists, the fighters eliminated four terrorists and hit others.
At the same time, an IDF attack helicopter targeted the area of the structure used by the terrorists.

Additionally, the forces located three M-16 rifles, a pistol, several magazines used by the terrorists, and a vehicle containing multiple explosives.

The confiscated weaponry has been transferred for further handling by security forces, with no casualties among our forces.

Attached is a photo of the weapons found in the area: https://IDFANC.activetrail.biz/ANC11062024745697406359
